Source: The Elder Scrolls Online undergoes regular maintenance to provide you with the best service possible. We have scheduled the following window for this purpose, although we may not need to use it every week.

Most maintenance periods will last for no more than a few hours. During these times, we'll deploy patches, server optimizations, database updates, hardware upgrades, and perform other routines that keep ESO running smoothly.
EST - Eastern Standard Time; CET - Central European Time
